column4: which vnc server is considered to be secure and efficient? I am looking at x11vnc and freenx to replace vino.
freenx is much faster than vnc.  No vnc is very secure.  If you want that, tunnel it through a vpn or ssh.
I don't know remmina.  I would get an nx client.
will install freenx and see how it goes, thnx
by the way how it change between users on the server with out losing the connection?
I used the default one under System/Preferences/Remote Desktop.  On xubuntu, I setup vino.
